content.title: Thank You for Your Support - Super Tiny RP2040/ESP32 Display Board
content.creator:
Majeed Mohsin
March 17, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are incredibly grateful for your amazing support in bringing the Super Tiny RP2040/ESP32 Display Development Board to life! Thanks to your enthusiasm and belief in this project, we successfully reached our funding goal.
If you missed out on the campaign or know someone who still wants to grab this versatile and compact display board, we have good news! The Super Tiny RP2040/ESP32 Display Development Board is now available for Late Pledge. This is your opportunity to secure the board and experience its powerful capabilities firsthand.
ðŸ”— Late Pledge Here
We truly appreciate your support and can't wait to see the innovative projects you create using the Super Tiny RP2040/ESP32 Display Board. Stay tuned for updates as we move forward with production and shipping.
If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out.
Thanks
Majeed Mohsin
